summary: Krishna is forced by circumstances to use his superpowers and become the masked superhero Krrish, before getting drawn towards his lost legacy.
cast: Hrithik Roshan|Priyanka Chopra|Rekha|Naseeruddin Shah|Sharat Saxena|Manini M. Mishra|Puneet Issar|Hemant Pandey|Akash Khurana|Ahmed Khan|Xia Bin|Edgar Noordanus|Mithilesh Chaturvedi|Zain Khan|Fardeen Hussaini|Micky Dhamejani|Yu Xuan|Archana Puran Singh|Kiran Juneja|Preity Zinta
keywords: breaking the fourth wall by talking to the audience|breaking the fourth wall|supernatural power|non comic book superhero|character name as title
title: Krrish
